subsection.name: ESI & Aggregator
subsection.p: ESI tags and comment-based directives are now processed by extensions. These extensions are enabled by default.
If you are overriding extensions in esigate.properties and use ESI and/or Aggregator features, you must add the corresponding extension before other rendering extensions (especially ResourceFixup)

subsection.name: Cache
subsection.p: The HTTP client and cache has been updated to Apache HttpClient 4.3. This release fixes handling of "Vary: Cookie" header and has been through major refactoring. All esigate tests have passed, but there may be other small differences in behavior. It would be a good idea to test your applications to ensure they are not broken by these changes.
